description: A fast, low-cost Ethereum network. Many routes use Base to keep transactions quick and affordable.
The engine behind Oracle's swap, bridge, and send. Relay moves value between blockchains quickly and at low cost, so transfers feel simple and instant.
Buy crypto with cards, bank transfers, or mobile pay. Handles account checks where required and sends assets to your wallet.
Sign-in and wallet management. Connect an existing wallet or create a new self-custodial one, with a smooth, secure experience.
Price charts and pool information. Powers Oracle's chart view with live and historical market data.
Helps find tokens and pairs across many networks. Adds prices, volumes, and other quick market snapshots.
Community signals and trending coins from the Farcaster ecosystem, used for discovery.
The main Farcaster app. Oracle links to profiles and posts so you can explore the people behind on-chain activity.
The team building Oracle. Focused on fast, user-friendly crypto apps.
Reads blockchain activity quickly and reliably, helping Oracle show recent trades and updates in the feed.
Dashboards and analytics used for research and market context.
A decentralized exchange (DEX). Public swaps from Balancer appear in Oracle's feed.
One of the largest DEXs. Oracle shows public Uniswap trades and lets you mirror them with a pre-filled route.
Popular DEX on multiple networks. Public swaps are surfaced in the feed with links for quick review.
